title: 94/645/EC: Commission Decision of 19 September 1994 on the eligibility of expenditure to be incurred by Italy on the implementation of pilot projects involving the use of continuous position monitoring systems for fishing vessels (Only the Italian text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 19 September 1994 on the eligibility of expenditure to be incurred by Italy on the implementation of pilot projects involving the use of continuous position monitoring systems for fishing vessels (Only the Italian text is  authentic) (94/645/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The expenditure for 1994 and 1995 shown in the Annex, corresponding to an amount of ECU 461 129 and ECU 461 129 respectively, is eligible for a Community financial contribution of 100 %.
Any payment made by the Community shall be conditional on the Commission receiving all the information referred to in point 2 of Annex A to Decision 89/631/EEC.
This Decision is addressed to the Republic of Italy.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 19 September 1994.
For the Commission
Yannis PALEOKRASSAS
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 364, 14. 12. 1989, p. 64.
(2) OJ No L 101, 20. 4. 1994, p. 9.
PARARTIMA ANEXO / BILAG / ANHANG /  / ANNEX / ANNEXE / ALLEGATO / BIJLAGE / ANEXO
